alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 10:15PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to locally 12 inches, greatest along the spine of the Keweenaw from Mohawk to Copper Harbor. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Northern Houghton and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility resulting in localized blizzard conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
